titleStmt.title: The reuenge of Bussy D'Ambois A tragedie. As it hath beene often presented at the priuate play-house in the White-Fryers. VVritten by George Chapman, Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] and are to be solde by Iohn Helme, at his shop in S. Dunstones Church-yard, in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstones Church-yard, in Fleetstreet
